name: phase3.3-parallel
description: A/B test for Phase 3.3: Parallel Search. Compare root-parallel MCTS vs single-threaded baseline.

p2.description: New: root parallelization using all available cores

notes.hypothesis: Parallel search should achieve near-linear speedup (4 cores = 3-4x faster)
notes.success_criteria: 3-4x speedup with no win rate regression
notes.warning: Set parallel: false for this test to measure single-game parallelism accurately
